97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (09:26): I want to do it my self

de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:28): and then the skinning for the surfaces
97800b12618e32d2e5ee54cbdb9f25fa (09:28): Dont know what skinning is yet.
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:29): and shape it as the profile of the ship
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:29): give it the shape of the middle cross section
4b73aaf63965a221bb87262f8f71c4b6 (09:29): hey guys, so.... I have a question... please let me know when you are "open" for it... :D (thanks)
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:30): and you can ass vetices as needed
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:30): and after you did that
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:31): as many times as necessary
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:32): and after that adujt the curves to match the various sections of the ship at different points along it's lenth
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:32): you odnt need to extrude
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:32): select the segment and press W  to subdivide it
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:33): and after you pressed subdivide it's gona appear a point in the middle of the segment
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:35): and after you did everything I wrote you up there
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:35): and then switch to Editmode
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:36): and select all the points with A key
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:36): and you'll have a skinned NURB curve that's gona look like the bottom of the boat
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:37): did it work? or you're still doin it?
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:38): cool, if you got some trouble ask me again about it :)
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:40): yep, and then go to edit mode and select all the vertices and then press F to shape it better
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:40): and after that you are gona have the hull of the boat
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:40): and now you can start
de4f2a9d3d38bb77015fab9e0caa7a56 (09:41): workin on the things that are on top of the boat
